title: U&B Winery
description: The goal of this project was to transform an existing PHP website using Angular 2.

title: Neighborhood Map
description: A simple map using Google's Map API, augmented with Foursquare to provide location information.

title: Multi-User Blog
description: Google App Engine Python powered blog. Users can view and like each other's posts. They can edit and delete their own.

title: Yahtzee! Game API
description: Another Google App Engine Python project. This API can be used to power a frontend implementation of the popular game.

title: Store App
description: The popular Python Flask framework with SQLAlchemy paired with an AngularJS frontend provided the building blocks for this project. Registered users may post, edit, and remove their categorized items. Additional information, such as cost, stock, description, and product images can be added.
